entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
